summary: Completed testing of Observability Hub & Error Triage Panel. Backend APIs are mostly functional (73% success rate) with authentication, test panel runs, and error inbox endpoints working. Frontend loads but has login flow issues preventing full UI testing. Core observability features implemented correctly.

flaky_endpoints.impact: Blocks testing of basic health endpoints

ui_bugs.issue: PIN pad entry not completing login flow with PIN 1234

integration_issues.issue: After entering PIN 1234 in ADMIN mode, dashboard does not load

passed_tests: Test run artifact creation with display_id format (RUN-XXXX)
Test run has required fields (id, display_id, venue_id, created_at, target, status_code, steps)
Owner permissions for error inbox view
PIN pad interface visible and responsive

success_percentage.frontend: 30% (Login flow blocked, UI elements visible but not accessible)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix PIN login flow - PIN 1234 entry not completing authentication in ADMIN mode. Add /api/health to observability service safe_prefixes. Investigate error capture middleware - no errors being captured in error inbox.
